Plot: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.
Title: Born on the Fourth of July
Writer: Ron Kovic (book), Oliver Stone (screenplay), Ron Kovic (screenplay)
Actors: Tom Cruise, Raymond J. Barry, Caroline Kava, Josh Evans
tomatoConsensus: Led by an unforgettable performance from Tom Cruise, Born on the Fourth of July finds director Oliver Stone tackling thought-provoking subject matter with ambitious élan.
